class.name: GraphPlotting
class.documentation: This action routine (and C++object) controls the plotting of curves, bar charts and area charts.

parameter.name: legend
parameter.documentation: Turn on/off the legend for this graph (this parameter is new to Magics++)

parameter.name: legend_user_text
parameter.documentation: User-defined text for the legend of this graph

parameter.name: graph_type
parameter.documentation: Defines the type of curve required
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter graph_type sent to new Magics[Graph].
